page.title: 17RELIGION CHURCH AND CHAPEL
page.content: {CHURCH }The church is 700 years old and is called St.John's Church. It was built by the Saxons. It has 11 windows. In the graveyard there are 91 graves and inside the church 8. The church has 23 trees in the church area. The church has 21 pews and 2 bells which Mr.Clark rings. There are 6 choir children, a vicar, Canon Andrew, and an organist. The church has an average of 25 attenders. {CHAPEL }The chapel is 117 years old. It has l5 windows counting the front door windows. There are no trees in the chapel area. There are 25 pews. The chapel has on average l0 people who attend. There is no choir and no graves. There are also no bells. The services are run by Mrs.Read, Mrs.Vincent and a variety of ministers.
